nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing

Class OrchestratedTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • org.apache.camel.test.junit4.TestSupport
        • org.apache.camel.test.junit4.CamelTestSupport
          • org.apache.camel.test.spring.CamelSpringTestSupport
            • nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.OrchestratedTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrchestratedTestBuilder

    public class OrchestratedTest
extends org.apache.camel.test.spring.CamelSpringTestSupport
    This carries out the actual testing of the orchestrated specification specification - ensuring ordering of the received exchanges is as expected

    This will be extended for actual tests and will use JUnit Parameterized to add parameters at runtime.

    Author:
    David MacDonald
